name: Friendly but Friendless
description:
Friendly but Friendless is a game where you help Squary make his first friends, he has very little self-confidence. He shall go through twists and turns in the platformer to simulate challenges of anxiety.

PLEASE NOTE:

NOT recommended to play in fullscreen

This is my first game ever, please do not make fun of it

  • CONTROLS:
    A/D or Arrow Keys to move
    (SPACE) to jump
    (ESC) to pause

MADE USING:
https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements
https://mounirtohami.itch.io/minimalpixel-font
